org.forgerock.openam.authentication.service.protocol

Class RemoteServletResponse

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.authentication.service.protocol.RemoteServletResponse
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, javax.servlet.ServletResponse
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RemoteHttpServletResponse

    public class RemoteServletResponse
extends Object
implements javax.servlet.ServletResponse, Serializable
    Encapsulates the transferable state of a ServletResponse object.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
